00028 class YardDatabase;

00043 class YardPackageType: public XMLNode
00044 {
00045  public:
00046    
00047     friend class YardDatabase;
00048 
00049       
00050     YardPackageType() {}
00051     
00052     static const char * GetUnique() { return "PKG_ID_Number"; }
00053     /* gettors */
00054 
00056     int GetPackID() const { return m_packageID; }
00058     int GetTransID() const { return m_transID; }
00060     int GetCustAcctNum() const { return m_custAcctNum; }
00062     int GetCarrierID() const { return m_carrierID; }
00064     string GetTrackNum() const { return m_trackNum; }
00066     string GetShippingType() const{ return m_shippingType; }
00067 
00068     /* settors */
00069 
00071     void SetTransID(const int num) { m_transID = num; }
00073     void SetCustAcctNum(const int num) { m_custAcctNum = num; }
00075     void SetCarrierID(const int num) { m_carrierID = num; }
00077     void SetTrackNum(const string& str) { m_trackNum = str; }
00079     void SetShippingType(const string& str) { m_shippingType = str; }
00080 
00081 
00087     virtual string ToString(const string& delim = ",") const;
00088     
00089     virtual void FillFromStream(otl_stream * stream);
00090    
00091  private:
00092     
00093     /* These variables directly correspond with the database */
00094     int m_packageID;
00095     int m_transID;
00096     int m_custAcctNum;
00097     int m_carrierID;
00098     string m_trackNum;
00099     string m_shippingType;

00101 };

00104 /*
00105 DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Package_Table;
00106 
00107 CREATE TABLE Package_Table(
00108     PKG_ID_Number               INT AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
00109     PKG_REF_TRANS_ID            INT,
00110     PKG_REF_CUST_Account_Number     INT,
00111     PKG_REF_CRR_ID_Number           INT,
00112     PKG_Tracking_Number         varchar(50),
00113     PKG_REF_SHP_Shipping_Type       varchar(30),
00114     Primary Key(PKG_ID_Number),
00115     INDEX trans_id (PKG_REF_TRANS_ID),
00116     INDEX cust_acct (PKG_REF_CUST_Account_Number),
00117     INDEX crr_id (PKG_REF_CRR_ID_number),
00118     INDEX shp_type (PKG_REF_SHP_Shipping_Type),
00119     FOREIGN KEY (PKG_REF_TRANS_ID) REFERENCES Transaction_Log_Table( TRANS_ID ),
00120     FOREIGN KEY (PKG_REF_CUST_Account_Number) REFERENCES Customer_Table( CUST_Account_Number ),
00121     FOREIGN KEY (PKG_REF_CRR_ID_Number) REFERENCES Carrier_Table( CRR_ID ),
00122     FOREIGN KEY (PKG_REF_SHP_Shipping_Type) REFERENCES Shipping_Table( SHP_Type )
00123 ) type=InnoDB
00124 */
